name: IQuest Coder V1
description: Open-source coding AI from Chinese hedge fund Ubiquant's IQuest Lab that beats Claude Sonnet 4.5 and GPT models on benchmarks with only 40B parameters. Uses innovative Code-Flow Training on commit histories and repository evolution. Available in three variants: Instruct (general coding), Thinking (complex reasoning), and Loop (efficient deployment).
community_quotes: Beats Claude Sonnet 4.5 and GPT 5.1 with only 40B parameters
Innovative Code-Flow Training on commit histories
Fully open source and can be self-hosted

name: Mysti
description: VS Code extension that orchestrates multiple AI coding agents (Claude Code, OpenAI Codex, Gemini, GitHub Copilot) to collaborate in 'brainstorm mode' where agents debate solutions and synthesize the best approach. Features 16 developer personas, 12 toggleable skills, conversation history, and permission controls from read-only to full-access.
community_quotes: Multi-agent brainstorming where two AIs collaborate and debate solutions
Lets you pick any two AI agents to debate your code and synthesize the best solution
Switch providers with one click - no lock-in
Wisdom of the crowd where collective intelligence outperforms a single agent
Context sharing without passing - agents share the same context directly
